body.title: Contributing
body.volunteer: Get involved with CHMA as a volunteer

map.error: Mapbox token is missing. Please inform

airtableUpdate.message: Update a request with the above address

email.subject: Covid Resources NYC
email.body:
Sorry we couldn't help out :/
Here's a regularly updated list of resources:

sendResources.message: You can use the link below to send more resources if needed!

message.info: Enter an address and we will look up cross streets and the neighborhood.
message.help: For best results, enter street and town (Ex: 1550 dean st brooklyn)
message.privacy: The address will not be stored or logged :)
message.reminder: Reminder: the boundaries on this map show a defined delivery area, per our Delivery Area proposal that passed 7/25. CHMA cannot make any deliveries outside of this area, no exceptions.

label.neighborhoodError: If both this and zone are unavailable, double check the map: https://bit.ly/2UrZPkA

geoError.message: Error loading. Please try again. If it fails again, let us know in

deliveryNeeded.title: {{neighborhood}} Delivery Needed
deliveryNeeded.mapDesc: Map of all open requests marked "Delivery Needed".

description.dot:
Each dot represents a location with one or more requests. This
            location is only representative of the cross street data. We do not
            store full addresses.
description.clickDot:
Click on each cluster (large circle with a number) to zoom into
            individual request.
description.popUp:
Click on a dot to pop up details. There is a link to the Slack post
            for more details, where you can also claim the delivery.
description.questions: For any questions or technical issues, please email us at
description.multipleRequests:
Some dots may represent multiple requests at the same cross-streets.
            Clicking on them will display all of the requests.

popup.cantFindSlack: Can't find Slack link, please search for request code in Slack.
popup.daysOpenNotAvailable: This information is not available for some reason. Please reach out to #tech_support on Slack

noRequests.message: No requests found. Some requests may not have been posted in Slack yet or be marked for driving clusters.

requestNotFound.message: Request with code {{requestCode}} is not found. This means that the request is no longer in 'Delivery Needed' status.

dialog.title: Do you agree to complete this delivery?
dialog.condition:
If you agree, we will ask for your phone number so we can text you the
            details for the delivery You should aim to follow up with your neighbor
            and complete the delivery in the next day or two.
dialog.reminder:
Reminder: Please don’t volunteer for delivery if you have any
              COVID-19/cold/flu-like symptoms, or have come into contact with
              someone that’s tested positive. If you have been in large crowds
              or demonstrations, please self-isolate for 14 days or wait 5 days
              to get a test, and resume deliveries after testing negative.
dialog.accept_btn: YES, I will take on this delivery.
dialog.form: Please provide your phone number so we can text you the details of the delivery. You must be registered as a delivery volunteer in our system.
dialog.errorBody: An unknown error occurred. Please take a screenshot and contact #tech_support.

help.title: How do I use this map?
